SELECT `key`, discount_name, dn.`name` as "discountTypeStr", start_time as "startTimeStr", end_time as "endTimeStr", COUNT(is_get) AS discount_count, SUM(is_get) AS get_count, SUM(is_use) AS use_count FROM `litemall_discount` dc left JOIN litemall_dictionary dn on dc.discount_type = dn.id WHERE 1 = 1
AND discount_name LIKE concat(concat('%',#{discountName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')
AND dc.discount_type = #{discountType,jdbcType=INTEGER}
GROUP BY `key` , discount_name , start_time , end_time , discountTypeStr

SELECT li.`key`, li.discount_name, li.start_time, li.end_time, COUNT(li.is_get) AS discount_count, SUM(li.is_get) AS get_count, SUM(li.is_use) AS use_count, ifnull((SELECT '1' FROM litemall_discount WHERE `key` = li.`key` and user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'0') AS is_user FROM `litemall_discount` AS li WHERE 1 = 1 AND li.end_time >= curdate()
AND `key` = #{key,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND discount_name LIKE concat(concat('%',#{discountName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')
GROUP BY `key` , discount_name , start_time , end_time
